#Text=Choose Best Digital Marketing Course
#Text=Digital marketing is evolving and changing the world like ever .
#Text=Every second , a startup is launched across the globe .
#Text=And the increasing need of digital marketing professionals , there is also a rise in the training institutes who are offering professional courses and making you ready for the industry needs .
#Text=According to reports from various organizations , the online advertising market in India is expected to touch $ 1.2billion by the end of 2016 .
#Text=In the current digital advertisement market ; the search and the display feature contribute the most .
#Text=Thus in this competitive training industry , there is a need of institute that prepare professionals for the industry .
#Text=Before going for any professional course in digital marketing whether it is online or offline , you must verify some things so that it must help you professionally in your career prospect .
#Text=Here are those criteria to look for :
#Text=Steps
#Text=· Course Curriculum &Trainer : Before enrolling for any course in the digital marketing , look for the curriculum which is currently in demand in the market .
#Text=Measure the institute for the course they offer and check the expertise of their trainers .
#Text=The best way to check these all is to attend a demo class with the training institute .
#Text=· Certification : A professional certification can definitely make a difference while you are a fresher .
#Text=Sometimes it also helps if you have experience in a particular domain but having a certification in digital marketing ensures that you are an expert in this field too .
#Text=Thus choosing a good institute giving certification in the digital marketing field will help you in getting a good job profile or a good bump in the salary package .
#Text=So opt for certification courses recognized by the industry .
#Text=· Reviews : Always look for reviews and go with it .
#Text=It helps you giving a clear view about the course and the institute .
#Text=The students who have taken training from the institute always giveright review what they have felt during the training .
#Text=So check for reviews and recommendations from the ex-students through discussion forums .
#Text=Reach out to alumni of the institute oversocial media platforms and ask for the feedback , where possible .
#Text=· Placements : over all , placement is the first and last thing a fresher need and thinks before joining any course .
#Text=Research and look for the placement service offered by the institute and go for feedback from the ex-students .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Once you are done with the above research work then go with the best training institute .
#Text=For your convenient , below are the most popular institutes offering Digital Marketing courses .
#Text=Delhi School of Internet Marketing(DSIM ) : Founded in 2011 by Kunal Choudhary .

#Text=Delhi School of Internet Marketing offers advanced digital marketing training that covers 17 modules and provides both in-class and live-online classes for working professionals , business owners and job-seekers .
#Text=For in-class training , the centers are available in Delhi , Bangalore and Kolkata .
#Text=The program costs Rs . 48,450 + Tax .
#Text=DSIM offers 8 certifications .
#Text=Placement support is good for working professionals and freshers .
#Text=DSIM claims to have more than 7095 professionals trained through their ADMTP and their trainees have been placed in various renowned brands and organizations .
#Text=You can check out reviews of the institute here . http://dsimreviews.com/
#Text=Digital Vidya :
#Text=The Course/Training includes 6 core Modules and 15 specialized modules .
#Text=All courses are online with no physical venue .
#Text=The CDMM – Certified Digital Marketing Master Course costing is INR49 , 900 + Service tax .
#Text=Digital Vidya offers 8 certification courses according to the need .
#Text=Placement support is good for newbies and Freshers .
#Text=Digital Vidya has claimed to conduct over 700 trainingprograms for more than 12,000 participants from across Asia .
#Text=You can check out reviews of the institute here :
#Text=http://coursedekho.com/2015/09/01/digital-vidya-review/
#Text=NIIT : The first institutes to launch a comprehensive digital marketing training program in India in 2012 and offers Professional Diploma in Digital Marketing .
#Text=The training will happen via a live video stream rather than offering fully online training .
#Text=No option for online Learning and course fee is non transparent .
#Text=NIIT Imperia has partnered with Digital Marketing Institute ( DMI ) Ireland to offer a Professional Diploma in Digital Marketing .
#Text=This course is accredited by Further Education and Training Awards Council ( FETAC ) of Ireland .
#Text=NIIT claim to train 40,000 professionals .
#Text=The training centers of NIIT are spread in more than 30 cities of India , butthe lead instructor will not be physically present .
#Text=You can check out reviews of the institute here :
#Text=http://www.mouthshut.com/product-reviews/NIIT-Mumbai-reviews-925002525
#Text=Simplilearn : Simplilearn was founded in 2009 by Krishna Kumar .
#Text=The Digital marketing Training program is named as Advance online marketing certification training .
#Text=The Course covers 9 Modules and provides only e learning based classes .

#Text=The program costs Rs.49,999+ taxes . offers Master program certification by OMCP.org.OMCP is awarded to professionals who have completed extensive training and possess several years of online marketing experience .
#Text=Initially Simplilearn was a blog with useful tips which later evolved into a training company .
#Text=The course aimed at helping working professionals and aspirants .
#Text=You can check out reviews of the institute here .
#Text=http://www.simplilearn.com/reviews
